title: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls
description: Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm of the season
content:
PORTLAND, Maine -- Black ice, snow showers and fog pestered post-holiday travelers in the Midwest on Monday while the Northeast geared up for its first major snowstorm of the season.
More than 8 inc… [+4411 chars]
de: Für den Nordosten wird heftiger Schneefall vorhergesagt, während der Mittlere Westen immer noch mit den Wetterproblemen an Thanksgiving zu kämpfen hat. Glatteis, Schneeschauer und Nebel plagen Reisende nach dem Urlaub im Mittleren Westen, während sich der Nordosten auf den ersten großen Schneesturm der Saison vorbereitet
en: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls. Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm of the season
la: Gravis nix praenuntiata ad Orientem orientis sicut Midwest adhuc cum Gratiarum actione tempestatum obtrectat. Glacies nigra, imbres nivis et nebula post ferias viatores in Midwest infestant, dum Orientem brumalem ad primam maiorem nivem temporis anni machinatur.
